allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive paper summary document

- Create paper_summary.tex following academic summary format
- Covers fourth down and two-point conversion analysis
- Key findings:
  - 80.1% ex ante optimal on fourth down \(no improvement trend\)
  - 96.4% of decisions knowable in real-time
  - 0.27 wins lost per team per season \(increasing over time\)
  - Two-point: +1.0 pp/year improvement \(simpler decision\)
- Includes worst decisions table, Romer comparison, robustness checks
- Lists suggestions for additional analysis

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
